channel.title: 562 adding quests?
channel.description: Sorry if this is in the wrong section but I've been working on my server its a 562 base. I want to add quests to my server but Im not sure how on a 562 all the tutorials ive found are for 317's. I can spawn the npc's and make them walk around but i would like to add the regular runescape quests in the quests tab plus my own.

I wasn’t sure that’s why I said sorry if it was. My mistake.
